messages.subject: Re: this is the real thing not a test
messages.msgSnippet: Okay......what gives?  Take me to the wizard.  I want to know how you knew? My settings at onelist were all the same except I ignored their directions to use
messages.messageBody:
Okay......what gives? Take me to the wizard. I want to know how you knew?
My settings at onelist were all the same except I ignored their directions
to use plain text if you have Outlook Explorer which is where I am sending
this from. I said use HTML instead.

Come on. Spill the beans.


-----Original Message-----
From: Bonknit@... <Bonknit@...>
To: Unschooling-dotcom@onelist.com <Unschooling-dotcom@onelist.com>
Date: November 13, 1999 7:39 PM
Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] delete this test message


>From: Bonknit@...
>
>In a message dated 11/13/99 8:07:57 PM Eastern Standard Time,
>jhawthorne@... writes:
>
><< I have now changed the settings at onelist.com. Will this have any
effect?
> >>
>
>This is the great and powerful OZ, I see great things in your future.
>Wait..it's coming..
>yes,messages, many, many messages. The great Oz has spoken, now be gone!!!
>
>Laura( Are we in Kansas yet?)
>

messages.subject: Re: this is the real thing not a test

messages.messageBody:
